Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Aspartylglucosaminuria among Palestinian Arabs .

Let's think step by step.

1. Aspartylglucosaminuria

This is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a metabolic disorder characterized by the deficiency of the enzyme N-acetyl-L-aspartate:L-asparaginase-N-acetyl-beta-D-glucosaminide 1-N-acetyltransferase, leading to the accumulation of N-acetylaspartic acid and N-acetylglucosamine in the urine and other body fluids.
